{include "default_salutation"} –

We're excited to be partnering with the ACLU of Ohio for a special Civil Liberties Social Hour event, Thursday, February 20. Will you join us?

Executive Director of the ACLU of Ohio, J. Bennett Guess, and Executive Director of the ACLU of Kentucky, Michael Aldridge, will be hosting folks from all across Northern Kentucky and Cincinnati for a free get-together.

Twenty in '20: ACLU of Ohio's Statewide Immersion Tour – Cincinnati

Thursday, February 20, 5:30 p.m.
Taft's Ale House
Nellie's Taproom
1429 Race Street
Cincinnati, OH 45202

RSVP Today


We'll discuss our justice work, make new friends, share appetizers, and lift a glass for civil liberties! All are welcome to join us – newly familiar with the ACLU or a decades-long member. We hope to see you soon!

ACLU of {affiliate_name}
